metadata.inclusion:
Refer to your primary controller instructions to process the inclusion / exclusion setup procedure.
When prompted by your primary controller, press the button 3 times.
metadata.exclusion:
Refer to your primary controller instructions to process the inclusion / exclusion setup procedure.
When prompted by your primary controller, press the button 3 times.
metadata.reset:
Power off device, press and hold the button, then power on the device, after 5 seconds the device will reset.
This should only be used in the event your networkâ€™s primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable.
